DOC.brief_summary: This was a prospective, randomized, controlled, open, and multi-center trial conducted to compare the clinical efficacy and safety of ertapenem with it's comparator before or following adequate surgical management of complicated intra-abdominal infection.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Ertapenem Versus It's Comparator in the Treatment of Complicated Intra-abdominal Infections in Adults (0826-050)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Males or females between the ages of 18 and 75 who have complicated intraabdominal infection.
